In environment P : (nat -> R) -> Prop u : nat -> R a : R x : Rbar H0 : is_lim_seq u x X1, X0 : Prop Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally ?M2573 P -> filtermap (fun n : nat => ?M2569 n * ?M2570 n) eventually P" with "P (fun n : nat => a * u n)".
